testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.skipped: Given User is in login screen...............................................undefined When He clicks on sign in button............................................undefined Then He should be able to view username field...............................undefined And He should be able to view the password field............................undefined When The user enters a registered phone number..............................undefined And He enters a password related to the phone number........................undefined And Click on sign in........................................................undefined Then He should be able to view the Home page of the application.............undefined
